discussiontools-desc: Azọnwanu nado gọalọna weda hodọdopo tọn lẹ.
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: Gblọndo towe ma sọgan yin sisẹdo, na mẹdevo ko na gblọndo to whenue a to gblọndo na. Jaale bo vọ gblọndo towe kan kavi bo vọ weda lọ mẹ biọ nado pọn diọdo yọyọ lẹ.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Linlẹn he a to gblọndo etọn na to weda ehe ji ma yin mimọ. E sọgan ko yin súnsún kavi zize dó weda devo ji. Jaale vọ awulena weda lọ bo sọ tẹnpọn dogọ.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" nọtẹn intẹnẹt tọn ehe ma sọgan yin yiyizan dó na gblọndo na linlẹn ehe. Nado na gblọndo, jaale bo zan weda vivọ jlado gigọ gbọn "$1" zinzin dali.
"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" nọtẹn intẹnẹt tọn ehe ma sọgan yin yiyizan dó na gblọndo na linlẹn ehe na weda devo mẹ wẹ e wa sọn. Nado na gblọndo, jaale bo yí: [[$1]].
discussiontools-error-comment-not-saved: Linlẹn towe ma sọgan yin zize sẹdò weda yọyọ agọe tọn ji. Nado mọ diọdo agọe tọn lẹ, basi vọkan nuhe a ko kandai lẹ tọn bo zan fie yè nọ kàn adlẹsi Intẹnẹt ji tọn do towe nado vọ weda lọ hùn.
discussiontools-error-lint: Ohó depope ma sọgan yin didọ gando gblọndo he yin nina to weda ehe mẹ lẹ go na nuṣiwa dé tin to wikitext lọ mẹ wutu. A sọgan yọn nususu dogọ gando nuṣiwa ehe go eyin a [$1 hia kandai nudọnamẹ lẹ tọn], a sọgan biọ alọgọ eyin a [$2 sẹ́ hodidọ towe do fi] kavi a sọgan jla nuṣiwa lọ do eyin a [$3 hùn adà weda blebu vivọjlado tọn]
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove: Jaale, nado lẹkọ do ninọmẹ awusọhia tọn ko yin susú na $1 yin mimọ to linlẹn he a ko kan mẹ.[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:DiscussionTools/Reply_tool_visual_mode_limitations Plọnnu dogọ].
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-title: A má sọgan mọ yẹdide depope
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: Jaale wleawuna hosọ dè na hodọdopọ towe. E yin a zin"{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}", hodọdopọ towe na yin yiyi dogọ ṣigba é ma na dó hosọ.
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|Gblọndo yọyọ dopo|$1 gblọndo yọyọ lẹ |100= po gblọndo yọyọ nayi kanwe-fọ̀ntọnnukunẹnẹ po}} to "$3".
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-to: Hosọ towe ko yin yiyi dogọ.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool: Nagbe nado yawu yi hosọ dogọ
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon: E jlo we nugbo nado súnsún linlẹn he kan a tẹ lọ yá?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-keep: Zindonukọn to nue kan a te mẹ
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: A kudeji dọ a jlo na jo hosọ he ji a to wekan do lọ do yà?
Zindonukọn to nue kan a te mẹ
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: A ma ko hùn adà towe. Na yin yinyọnẹn po yinkọ towe po kakati nido yin adlẹsi IP tọn towe, a sọgan [$1 hùn adà towe] Kavi [$2 hùn adà yọyọ dé].
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback: Ma nudọnamẹ gando awusọhia ehe go
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo: $1 ko yin lilẹdo alọdowemẹ towe. Nado lẹkọ do de e tin te dai, kan $2. Doayiego dọ e ma yin dandan nado dó ohia linlẹn lẹ go po azọnwanu ehe po. Ohia alọdowemẹ tọn towe na yin yiyi dogọ na ede.
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Eyin a zin "$1", a ko yigbe na nudọnamẹ lẹ nado zan wiki ehe.
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Gblọndo towe na yin sisẹwhè to [[$1]]
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: A na mọ nudọmamẹ lẹ yi dogbọn linlẹn yọyọ lẹ to hosọ ehe mẹ.
A má to na mọ nudọmamẹ lẹ dogbọn linlẹn yọyọ lẹ yí to hosọ ehe mẹ ba.
tag-discussiontools-description: Vọjlado he yin bibasi gbọn DiscussionTools yiyizan dali
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Zinzantọ ehe yi DiscussionTools zan nado vọ gblọndo he tin to aimẹ dé jlado
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Zinzantọ ehe yi DiscussionTools zan nado gọ́ hosọ yọyọ dé na weda lọ
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Zinzantọ ehe yi DiscussionTools zan nado dọ linlẹn etọn gando gblọndo dé go
tag-discussiontools-source-description: DiscussionTools tin to ninọmẹ asisa tọn mẹ dai
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: DiscussionTools tin to ninọmẹ nupinpọn tọn mẹ dai
